dimensions: Sheet: 102.9 x 75.9 cm (40 1/2 x 29 7/8 in.) Custom Frame required
title: Cartoon for a Woven Carpet
medium: Brush and gouache on heavy paper, lined
description:
Part of a large repeat showing a spray of roses and other flowers on off white paper, framed by foliate cartouches with blue and green grounds outside enframement.  Continuation of repeat with 1954-23-12 and -13.  Squared off (in pencil) in large blocks from transfer.
Graphite line along left and bottom edge; detached section shows that part of the verso has a printed design.  Lt. blue-green background with white floral design printed on top.
name: Drawing
